dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Velius! Your reign of darkness ends here and now.

dialogues.speaker: Velius
dialogues.message: (laughs darkly) Ah, Leon. So eager to play the hero, are we? You truly believe you can defeat me, the master of dark magic?

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: I may not have your power, Velius, but I have something you lack - courage.

dialogues.speaker: Velius
dialogues.message: (sneers) Courage, you say? Courage won't save you from the might of my magic. Prepare to witness true power!

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Your darkness ends now, Velius! Surrender, and perhaps you will find redemption.

dialogues.speaker: Velius
dialogues.message: (wounded and furious) Redemption? There is no redemption for one such as me. But know this, Leon - even if you defeat me, the darkness will always find a way to return.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: (defiant) Perhaps. But as long as there are those willing to stand against it, the light will never be extinguished.
